item.title: Help :)
item.dc:creator: @Rudolph Rudolph
item.description:
@Rudolph wrote:

How can I make barrage 1v1 instead of hitting multiple targets? And also, how can I add skulls over a players head? And here is my ice barrage case: if(spellID == 12891) // ice barrage (lvl 94 spell) { if(playerLevel[6] >= 94) { hitDiff = misc.random(35); startAnimation(1979); attackPlayersWithin(369, 40, 5); castOnPlayer.inCombat(); inCombat(); PkingDelay = 25; //stillgfx(369, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX); //castOnPlayer.stillgfx(369, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX); castOnPlayer.sendMessage("You have been frozen!"); sendMessage("You freeze the enemy!"); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; } else if(playerLevel[6] <= 93) { sendMessage("You need a magic level of 94 to cast this spell."); } }

Im guessing you change the attackplayerswithin number, that’s what i messed with a bit, but it didnt work so I put it back to normal. Thanks if anyone can help.

Read full topic
